name: easy-io-port
description: Simple hub for multiple writers / listeners.
author: Buddhike de Silva

scripts.test: istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u exports --compilers js:babel-register -R spec -r test/setup.js test/*{,*/}*.js
scripts.start: nodemon --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ --exec 'npm run eslint && npm run test && npm run build'
